get.description:
Returns real-time market data from supported protocols, such as Jupiter, Kamino, MarginFi, Lulo and many more. For more information, please check our [Protocol Support Roadmap](/markets/supported-protocols).

**Note:** Some providers (e.g. Kamino) may return large responses with 100+ markets. For better performance in the API playground, consider filtering by both `type` and `provider` parameters.

schema.description: Comma separated list of market types (`lending`, `yield`, `loop`, `perpetual`, `prediction`).
Comma-separated list of provider IDs (kamino, lulo, marginfi, jupiter, defituna, carrot, dflow)
Cursor for pagination (market ID to start after)
Number of markets to return (default: 50, max: 200)

Comma-separated list, only for prediction markets. Use with `type=prediction`.

Status options:
- `open` 
- `closed`
- `settled`

Examples:
- `{"prediction":{"status":["open"]}}`
- `{"prediction":{"status":["open", "closed"]}}`

liquidationLtv.description: Loan-to-value ratio at which liquidation occurs

baseDepositApy30d.description: 30-day average APY percentage ratio excluding rewards

baseDepositApy90d.description: 90-day average APY percentage ratio excluding rewards

baseDepositApy180d.description: 180-day average APY percentage ratio excluding rewards

baseBorrowApy30d.description: 30-day average APY percentage ratio excluding rewards

baseBorrowApy90d.description: 90-day average APY percentage ratio excluding rewards

baseBorrowApy180d.description: 180-day average APY percentage ratio excluding rewards

totalDeposit.description: Total amount deposited in the vault

totalDepositUsd.description: Total value of deposits in USD

rewards.description: Available rewards for this yield market

maxLtv.description: Maximum Loan-to-Value allowed when borrowing, expressed as a percentage of deposited value

liquidationLtv.description: Loan-to-Value percentage ratio of deposited value at which the position becomes liquidatable

bundleId.description: Identifier for positions bundled into one logical structure, such as position or market

cursor.description: Cursor for the next page, null if no more results

get.summary: List all markets grouped by type
get.description: Returns real-time market data from supported protocols, such as Jupiter, Kamino, MarginFi, Lulo and many more. For more information, please check our [Protocol Support Roadmap](/markets/supported-protocols).

get.description:
Fetch position snapshots within a time range for a wallet address

<Note>
**Learn More**: For detailed examples, resolution options, practical use cases, and how to interpret cumulative values, see our [Historical Position Data guide](/markets/history).
</Note>

schema.description: Start time of the snapshot. Date or datetime in RFC 3339 format
End time of the snapshot. Date or datetime in RFC 3339 format. Defaults to current time if not provided
Time interval for historical snapshots. Controls the granularity of data points returned.

get.summary: List all market positions by wallet address
get.description: Returns position data for supported protocols, such as Jupiter, Kamino, MarginFi, Lulo and many more. For more information, please check our [Protocol Support Roadmap](/markets/supported-protocols).

schema.description: Comma separated list of owner addresses. Currently only supports one address.
Comma separated list of bundle IDs. Currently only supports one bundle ID.

Comma separated list of position types (`lending`, `yield`, `loop`, `reward`, `prediction`). Currently only supports one position type. If no position type is specified, all position types are returned.

bundleId.description: Identifier for positions bundled into one logical structure, such as position or market

ltv.description: Current Loan-to-Value of the position, expressed as a percentage ratio of deposited value

liquidationPrice.description: Deposited token price expressed in borrowed token units at which the position becomes liquidatable

maxLtv.description: Maximum Loan-to-Value allowed when borrowing, expressed as a percentage of deposited value

liquidationLtv.description: Loan-to-Value percentage ratio of deposited value at which the position becomes liquidatable

liquidationPenalty.description: Percentage ratio of deposited value taken as a penalty and given to liquidators when position is liquidated

totalDeposit.description: Total amount deposited in the vault

totalDepositUsd.description: Total value of deposits in USD

rewards.description: Available rewards for this yield market

bundleId.description: Identifier for positions bundled into one logical structure, such as position or market

amount.description: Current networth of the position in borrowed token value

amountUsd.description: Current networth of the position in USD

ltv.description: Current Loan-to-Value before either full/partial liquidation commences (depending on the provider), expressed as a percentage ratio of deposited value

liquidationPrice.description: Deposited token price expressed in borrowed token units at which the position becomes liquidatable, fully or partially.

leverage.description: Current leverage of the position, expressed as a multiplier

maxLeverage.description: Maximum leverage allowed when depositing, expressed as a multiplier

maxLtv.description: Maximum Loan-to-Value before either full/partial liquidation commences (depending on the provider), expressed as a percentage ratio of deposited value

liquidationLtv.description: Loan-to-Value percentage ratio of deposited value at which the position becomes liquidatable, fully or partially.

bundleId.description: Identifier for positions bundled into one logical structure, such as position or market
Identifier for positions bundled into one logical structure, such as position or market
Identifier for positions bundled into one logical structure, such as position or market

apiKey.name: x-dialect-api-key
apiKey.description: API key for the Markets API
